raw:
{{Infobox item poe2
| name           = Dream Journal 
| icon           = poe2 journal_brown icon.png
| description    = The writing on this tattered scrap of paper looks like it was penned by someone still half-asleep:

"Have you ever had a dream so real that you, you wanted- that you wanted Eothas so badly that you could do anything?"

A line is drawn through the writing, below which its author has scrawled:

"No more cheese before bed!"
